title: The Adventure Zone: The Live Boston Stunt Spectacular
description: Travis and Teresa had a baby! We're so excited for them, but we're also very excited for YOU! Because you're about to hear a live episode we recorded in Boston this past July that turned out super, super great. Thanks to everyone in attendance, and to all our listeners for sticking with us during Trav's leave of absence!
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
